shortdesc.lang_cn: 插入集群和磁阵的关系
shortdesc.lang_en: Insert the relationship between cluster and sa

description.lang_cn: 插入集群和磁阵的关系，集群只能使用其相对应的磁阵。
description.lang_en: Insert the relationship between cluster and sa,cluster can only use its corresponding sa

parameter.name: session
parameter.lang_cn: 登录时由会话管理模块分配的随机字符串。
parameter.lang_en: Random string assigned by session manager at login.

parameter.name: sid
parameter.lang_cn: 需要维护的磁阵编号,这个编号必须是已经存在的磁阵的编号。
parameter.lang_en: the id of the sa, the id that stand for sa must exist.

parameter.name: cluster_name
parameter.lang_cn: 集群名称，1至64个为数字或字母或下划线的字符。
parameter.lang_en: Cluster name, string length is between 1 and 64, and every character must be a numeric or letter or underline.

parameter.name: is_add
parameter.lang_cn: 是否增加磁阵对应的集群.反之则删除
parameter.lang_en: Is add the cluster for this sa .Inversely it will be deleted.

enum.lang_cn: 失败，对应关系已经存在
enum.lang_en: Failed, the relationship between cluster and sa already exist.
Failed, the relationship between cluster and sa not exist.
